title: Atelier Sophie 2 The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Free Download
description: This is a story about one of the adventures Sophie the Alchemist had after she left her hometown of Kirchen Bell. It is centered around Sophie’s quest of searching for Plachta after they are separated in a dream world of Erde Wiege, and the new friends they meet there. Dusk Diver 2

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or over, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or over
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or over, AMD Radeon RX 560 or over, 1280×720
